query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `piano_ownership_history` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `piano_id` int NOT NULL,
  `owner_name` varchar(200) NOT NULL,
  `owner_contact` varchar(200),
  `owner_address` text,
  `purchase_date` date,
  `sale_date` date,
  `purchase_price` decimal(10, 2),
  `sale_price` decimal(10, 2),
  `notes` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`piano_id`) REFERENCES `pianos`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE INDEX `idx_piano_ownership` ON `piano_ownership_history` (`piano_id`);
CREATE INDEX `idx_purchase_date` ON `piano_ownership_history` (`purchase_date`);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `piano_price_history` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `piano_id` int NOT NULL,
  `price` decimal(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  `price_type` enum('purchase', 'sale', 'appraisal', 'market', 'insurance') NOT NULL,
  `date` date NOT NULL,
  `source` varchar(200),
  `notes` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (`piano_id`) REFERENCES `pianos`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE INDEX `idx_piano_price` ON `piano_price_history` (`piano_id`);
CREATE INDEX `idx_price_date` ON `piano_price_history` (`date`);
CREATE INDEX `idx_price_type` ON `piano_price_history` (`price_type`);
